title: Nginx Config 10 08
content:
objectives #   unlink wordpress with NGINX 端口 upload static Hugo site configurate nginx 让 hugo site & other service占用不同端口  wordpress #  log in to server
su - author to change to the author user. Author user is for wordpress and in sudo group. Installed according to the tutorial. Database error when docker-compose. Put down first.
Upload static Hugo site #  hugo site generated. Then try to push to vps.
Add a new user for static site  adduser hugo
new password: ?qeT5rU5add a subdomain name from DNS.
 notes.midofnowher.link for documentation.  blog.midofnowhere.link for blog. Both are hugo generated static sites. IP directed to the same VPS. 参考教程.
